name: Sentret

passive.name: Alert
passive.effect: When a new Defending Pokemon comes in or when the Defending Pokemon evolves, Sentret may retreat immediately without paying its retreat cost.

attacks.name: Scout Ahead
attacks.effect: Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. Draw a card.

attacks.name: Frisk
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokemon has a Tool attached, deal 10 more damage.

flavor: Groups of these Pokemon alert each other to potential predators. Their network of calls protects the most vulnerable among them.
